snippet: The Knicks are on pace to run away from every team in the N.B.A. in 3-pointers, with 218 made on 534 attempts.
lead_paragraph: The Knicks are on pace to run away from every team in the N.B.A. in 3-pointers, with 218 made on 534 attempts.

headline.main: Knicks Are Bombarding Their Opponents With 3-Pointers
headline.print_headline: Knicks Are Bombarding Their Opponents With 3-Pointers
